text.name: sys_description
text.text: MUGEN is an engine for 2D fighting games, created by Elecbyte in 1999. Elecbyte distributed many free beta versions running under DOS, Linux and Windows. Despite long exposures, development has resumed actively since 2009. The engine allows the creation of characters, sets and other game components through a compilation of text, graphics and sound files. It also supports MP3 files for playing music in the background. This engine is advanced and flexible enough to match some commercial 2D fighting games, like Street Fighter 2 or King of Fighters.
